flawed_nl_solution:
There are 60 minutes in an hour, and 60 seconds in a minute so there are 60*60 = <<60*60=36000>>36000 seconds in an hour
The device records data every 5 seconds so there will be 36000/5 = <<36000/5=7200>>7200 instances of data in an hour.
#### 7200

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3600, not 36000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
